news_header: EU plans to simplify digital regulations to reduce bureaucracy and boost investment and innovation.
news_original_title: Henna Virkkunen: Euroopan komissio aikoo esittää viittä byrokratian purkupakettia
news_text: Digital Commissioner Henna Virkkunen announced that the European Commission aims to dismantle digital regulation through at least five legislative packages this year. The goal is to reduce administrative burdens and increase investment and innovation in Europe. Despite criticism from the US, the EU will continue to monitor its digital giants' regulation.
